title: River Road Recipes II: A Second Helping
description: A Walter s. McIlhenny Community Cookbook Hall of Fame Winner. This cookbook is filled with family-friendly creole and cajun cuisine. There are 600 recipes many of which use convenience products to help you get dinner on the table quicker. It is a must have for a family who insists on quality meals, but has little time to prepare them. Most recently published with a Concealed Wire-O Binding.
author: Junior League of Baton Rouge
